# Notification

Bold notification blocks, to alert your users of something.

## Usage

```html
<div class="notification is-primary">
  Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit lorem ipsum dolor.
  <strong>Pellentesque risus mi</strong>, tempus quis placerat ut, porta nec
  nulla. Vestibulum rhoncus ac ex sit amet fringilla. Nullam gravida purus diam,
  et dictum <a>felis venenatis</a> efficitur. Sit amet, consectetur adipiscing
  elit
</div>
```

### Colors

The notification element runs in various colors.

```html
<div class="notification is-primary">
  <strong>Primary</strong> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing
  elit lorem ipsum dolor.
</div>
<div class="notification is-info">
  <strong>Info</strong> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit
  lorem ipsum dolor.
</div>
<div class="notification is-success">
  <strong>Success</strong> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing
  elit lorem ipsum dolor.
</div>
<div class="notification is-warning">
  <strong>Warning</strong> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing
  elit lorem ipsum dolor.
</div>
<div class="notification is-danger">
  <strong>Danger</strong> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing
  elit lorem ipsum dolor.
</div>
<div class="notification is-link">
  <strong>Link</strong> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit lorem ipsum dolor.
</div>
```
